contentList.name: COTTM Online技术服务商：兴旅产业

desc.text: COTTM Online技术服务商：兴旅产业
兴旅产业集团，作为领先的旅游目的地营销商，多年来致力于旅业产业的B2C及B2B服务，在电商、传媒、公关、咨询、投资等方面，均具备了一定的行业影响力。目前，已在北京、杭州、沈阳、大连、长春、西安、首尔等地设立中心公司及分公司，为全国范围的景区、旅行社、旅游局等提供360度全方位的旅业B2C及B2B服务。

Rising Tourism Industry Corporation as the top travel-destination marketing agency, for many years we have dedicated ourselves to B2C and B2B service, accumulating influence in the fields of online retailing (tourism products), media, public relations, consulting and investment. Until now, we have already established offices in Beijing, Hangzhou, Shenyang, Dalian, Changchun, Xi’an and Seoul, providing all-around service to scenic spots, travel agencies and tourism bureaus all over China.
